# coolcool

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of coolcool is to be a package where a function will disappear from one version to the other, to illustrate the power of [renv](https://rstudio.github.io/renv).

## Installation

You can install the development version of coolcool like so:

``` r
pak::pak("maelle/coolcool")
```
